Name: OWASP Top Ten 2007 Category A1 - Cross Site Scripting (XSS)
Summary: Weaknesses in this category are related to the A1 category in the OWASP Top Ten 2007.

MappingNotes.Rationale: This entry is a Category. Using categories for mapping has been discouraged since 2019. Categories are informal organizational groupings of weaknesses that can help CWE users with data aggregation, navigation, and browsing. However, they are not weaknesses in themselves.
MappingNotes.Comments: See member weaknesses of this category.
